messages.title: The tactical vote in Bath
messages.content: You can make a difference here in Bath. The only way the Tories can be beaten is by voting for Wera Hobhouse, the Liberal Democrat candidate.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Will vote against a hard Brexit. Wera will fight for a deal that includes staying in the single market, protecting jobs and investment.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The leaflet emphasizes the importance of tactical voting in Bath, suggesting that a vote for the Liberal Democrats is the only way to defeat the Conservatives.

issues.brexitEurope: Will vote against a hard Brexit. We will fight for a deal that includes staying in the single market.

images.caption: Wera Hobhouse with Liberal Democrat supporters.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet also contains bar charts portraying the Liberal Democrats as the main challengers to the Conservatives in Bath.
